          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Galéria</string>
            <string language="en-US">Gallery</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galerie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Galerie</string>

          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az adott szinthez kapcsolódó - interaktív - mikrovilágok</string>
            <string language="en-US">Interactive micro-worlds related to every lesson of the given level.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">Logo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">Imagine Logo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">turtle graphics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">gallery</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Mikro-Welten standen auf jeder 
Lektion der gegebenen Stufe in Verbindung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les micro-mondes interactifs ont associé à 
chaque leçon du niveau donné.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os micro-mundos interativos relacionaram-se a cada
lição do nível dado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I micro-mondi interattivi si sono riferiti ad ogni
lezione di dato livello.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικοί μικροϋπολογιστής-κόσμοι σχετικοί με κάθε 
μάθημα του δεδομένου επιπέδου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los micro-mundos interactivos se relacionaron con 
cada lección del nivel dado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Firmenzeichen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie Sich Firmenzeichen Vor</string>
          </keyword>
